content.description: This is the lone route on the North side of the boulder.  Climb up the pockets and make a big move on smaller holds to get thru the crux.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus 2 bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Only bolted route on North Side of the boulder.

content.description: The tricky start requires a little smearing for shorter climbers which then leads into massive jugs with lots of possibilities. You then work your way up to a slightly tricky finish to get to the top edge.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus a bolted anchor with chains.
content.location: This route is directly West across the stream from the corridor on the Southern Approach.

content.description: This is a secluded boulder that has 2 moderate routes on opposite sides that doesn't attract many climbers.
